dublin_core.dcvalue: Dr. Sohail Agha, Director M&E, MCHIP, Email: sohail.agha@jhpiego.org | Monica Villanueva, AOR, USAID/Pakistan, Email: mvillanueva@usaid.gov

A mobile data tool that was used to collect information on health facility locations, ownership status (public, private etc), opening hours and types of services provided. GPS coordinates were submitted along with facility data, thus allowing users to click on a facility's symbol on Google Maps to show the location or search for facilities by district and other variables.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:20:12Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 gis_mapping_of_health_facilities.pdf: 257385 bytes, checksum: fe83977657ef6f7abbe54fca153e6d98 (MD5)
Data collection and reporting, Maternal Health, Newborn Health, Child Health
